Package com.hexaware.dao

Class PayrollService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.PayrollService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPayrollService
public class PayrollService extends Object implements IPayrollService
Implements the IPayrollService interface to provide functionalities related to payroll management.

    • GeneratePayroll

      public void GeneratePayroll(Payroll p, int employeeId, Date startDate, Date endDate) throws PayrollGenerationException
      Generates payroll for an employee within a specified period.
      Specified by:
      GeneratePayroll in interface IPayrollService
      Parameters:
      p - The Payroll object representing the payroll details.
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom payroll is generated.
      startDate - The start date of the payroll period.
      endDate - The end date of the payroll period.
      Throws:
      PayrollGenerationException - if an error occurs during payroll generation.
